meaning: withdraw, draw in, hold back, refrain from, be moderate

onyomiExamples.meaning: appeal to a higher court, intermediate appeal

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to be temperate in, to refrain, to abstain, to hold back, to restrain oneself from excessive ..., to make notes, to jot down (e.g. phone number), to be in preparation for, to be in waiting for, to be soon, to be in the offing, to be in a close relationship (e.g. as a backer, etc.)
reserve, spare, backup, note, memorandum, duplicate, copy, stub (of a ticket, etc.), waiting one's turn
waiting room, anteroom, antechamber, green room
